title: Watch: San Francisco officials victim shames shop owner after FOURTH time store was broke into

description:
A mom made three mistakes in this video you are about to see. The first mistake was that she visited San Francisco. The second mistake was that she was flying to Austin. The third mistake is unclear but United seems to have thought it was bad enough to strand her, her infant son, and her 75-year-old mother at the airport.

This story may have something to do with pronouns or it may have something to do with too many carry-on bags. That is up to you to decide.


Mom and her 16-year-old were just booted off their flight by United because the mom allegedly misgendered one of the flight attendants.

The mom and child are now stranded in San Francisco and need to get home to Austin.

Boycott United Airlines!
title: Watch: Woman Claims Airline Kicked Her Off Flight For Misgendering Employee
